alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TUCKER AND SOUTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parsons, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Davis, Thomas, Hendricks, Hambleton, Hannahsville, Elgon, Benbush, Lead Mine, Pifer Moutain, Silver Lake, and Aurora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Western Tucker
